*div1 type="summary"* *p*Austin to Emily M. Perry, July 24, 1828. Business settlement with Anthony Butler. Progress of his colony, nearly 3,000 inhabitants.*/p* */div1*
*div1 type="body"*
*p**location_mentioned*Texas*/location_mentioned*, *date_mentioned n="07-24-1828">July 24, 1828*/date_mentioned**/p* *p*Dr *person_mentioned*Sister*/person_mentioned**/p*
*p**person_mentioned*Lewis Morrison*/person_mentioned* will hand you this, he has passed through the *location_mentioned*country*/location_mentioned*, tho [he] has not had an opportunity of seeing the best part of it he can give you some account of the *location_mentioned*country */location_mentioned*etc—*/p*
*p*I am likely to have a serious difficulty with *person_mentioned*Col. [Anthony] Butler*/person_mentioned* relative to the old business at the *location_mentioned*Mines*/location_mentioned*— I fear that he is an unprincipled man— I wish you to get all the *location_mentioned*Lead and account Books*/location_mentioned* of mine, for the year I worked the *location_mentioned*mines */location_mentioned*in *person_mentioned*partnership */person_mentioned*with *person_mentioned*Butler*/person_mentioned*, it was the last year I had his *person_mentioned*negros*/person_mentioned*—we had them three years in all, two years on hire and one year him and myself worked the *location_mentioned*mines */location_mentioned*in *person_mentioned*partnership*/person_mentioned*—there was nothing made of consequence that year and I sent a full statement of the business of that season to *person_mentioned*Butler*/person_mentioned*, he has not produced it and seems to wish that I should pay him five or six thousand dollars. I wish you to get the *location_mentioned*Lead Book*/location_mentioned* of that year and send [it] to me by *person_mentioned*Mr. Honey*/person_mentioned* should he come out next fall and *location_mentioned*all the other Books of that years business*/location_mentioned*— I suppose they are with the other *location_mentioned*Books of *person_mentioned*Father*/person_mentioned*—*/location_mentioned* The *location_mentioned*Lead Book*/location_mentioned* is principally or all in *person_mentioned*Ballard*/person_mentioned*s hand writing—*/p*
*p*I hope *person_mentioned*John Austin*/person_mentioned* paid you a visit and gave you an account of the state of things here and some idea of the labor and difficulties I have struggled through in settling this *location_mentioned*wilderness */location_mentioned*I have nothing particular to write you— *person_mentioned*Brother */person_mentioned*and his *person_mentioned*wife */person_mentioned*are well, they are down the *location_mentioned*Brazos River*/location_mentioned* at this time *location_mentioned*near the coast*/location_mentioned*. I saw them a few days ago but we did not at that time know that *person_mentioned*Morrison */person_mentioned*would start so soon which [is] the reason he did not write you— The people here are generally healthy tho we have a severe drought, the crops however are abundantly sufficient— We have general peace and tranquility all over the *location_mentioned*country */location_mentioned*and the *location_mentioned*settlements */location_mentioned*are progressing slowly but surely When I came here there was not one civilized being *location_mentioned*within two hundred miles of this colony */location_mentioned*and now I have near *person_mentioned*three thousand*/person_mentioned* in it, and there are many large *location_mentioned*farms*/location_mentioned* and valuable improvements—but I am myself still poor as to disposable means—my object has been to settle the *location_mentioned*country */location_mentioned*more than to speculate and the expenses I have had to undergo have more than equalled what I have recd besides I have had some old debts to pay off the amount of the *location_mentioned*new Madrid*/location_mentioned* claims which I bought in *location_mentioned*St Louis*/location_mentioned* was over nine thousand dollars— I gave my notes for them and let *person_mentioned*Bryan */person_mentioned*have them all—I never received any thing from them and am still struggling along to pay for them also the balance due *person_mentioned*Butler */person_mentioned*for the hire of his *person_mentioned*negros */person_mentioned*all fall on me and I am working through that as fast as I can—*/p*
*p*do not fail to collect all the *location_mentioned*Books */location_mentioned*I have written for and be careful not to send them except by a *person_mentioned*safe hand*/person_mentioned**/p*
*p*Remember me to *person_mentioned*Mr Perry*/person_mentioned* and all *person_mentioned*friends*/person_mentioned**/p*
*p*your brother*/p* *p**person_mentioned*S. F. Austin */person_mentioned* [Rubric]*/p*
*p*Send the enclosed to *person_mentioned*Mr Carr*/person_mentioned* without delay*/p*
*p*[Rubric]*/p*
*p*Write me how political *person_mentioned*parties */person_mentioned*stand as regards *person_mentioned*Benton */person_mentioned*and *person_mentioned*Barton */person_mentioned*which of them stands highest, and which of them is supported by the *person_mentioned*Perrys */person_mentioned*and by *person_mentioned*Win C. Carr*/person_mentioned* and *person_mentioned*Elias Bates*/person_mentioned*— I am myself very much pleased with *person_mentioned*Bentons */person_mentioned*political course in the *person_mentioned*Senate*/person_mentioned*— I opened this after it was sealed*/p*
*p*We have *person_mentioned*Isaac B Desha*/person_mentioned* in irons here for murdering a man *location_mentioned*on the road between this and San Antonio*/location_mentioned*—his tryal is progressing, there appears but little doubt of his guilt—*/p*
*p*[Address:] *person_mentioned*Mrs Emiley A Perry*/person_mentioned* *location_mentioned*Potosí Missouri*/location_mentioned* pr *person_mentioned*Mr Lewis Morrison */person_mentioned**/p*
*/div1*
